mapper.select: select t.id from band t where email=#{email} and (t.phonenum1=#{phone1} and t.phonenum2=#{phone2} and t.phonenum3=#{phone3})
select * from member where email=#{email} and phonenum1=#{phonenum1} and phonenum2=#{phonenum2} and phonenum3=#{phonenum3}
select t.pass from band t where id=#{id}
select * from member where id=#{id} and name=#{name}
